########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/a3sat
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-a3sat)
set(GR_TEST_PYTHON_DIRS ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/swig)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_conv_enc ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_conv_enc.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_conv_dec ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_conv_dec.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_ldpc_enc ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_ldpc_enc.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_ldpc_dec ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_ldpc_dec.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_bch_enc ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_bch_enc.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_bch_dec ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_bch_dec.py)
